title: handwritten Modern Font Style?
content:
My boss is looking for this Font used in a logo. She saw it online and did a quick search, then passed it off to me, I've been searching and I've had no luck. I'm hoping someone on here has better luck than me, I figured it was a simple find, but, wow there's so many fonts out there. Thanks in advanced for any help.

\*\* Just in case I didn't get the upload right, here's the website. It's the thin black swirled font "alk of the town": [http://www.talkofthetownatlanta.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419033353/http:/www.talkofthetownatlanta.com/ "http://www.talkofthetownatlanta.com/")

Font: 

 Miss Fitzpatrick 

Solved By: 

 [R.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419033353/http:/typophile.com/user/57325 "View user profile.")

comments.content: Thanks so much for your help!
